Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

I'd like to share an interesting new version of the well known space oddity with you. It's not finished yet, as I didn't dind time to work on the interlude yet and I also want to add a better drum part. You still get the general idea and I believe you might like.

https://soundcloud.com/herrminator-1/major-jeb-kerbal-voice
Could you make a version that does not have an absolutley annoying high voice.

I actually have the original version in which the voice isn't pitched up, but I thought this would fit the game better. I may upload two versions of the finished song: One with a pitched voice and one without.

Hahahaha that's epic... And so Kerbal

Sadly we still can't pull off a music video from inside the KSS (cuz we don't have IVA at the moment ), that would have been epic...

I like the idea of a music video, so I just made this quick one:

http://youtu.be/bAlIMCPB8l8

It's work in progress, but I'd like to know what you guys think.
